prompt:
Transform the image into a cinematic Y2K photo: A woman lies on a red satin bed, clutching a black, 1990s-era corded telephone, her expression intense and pensive.

A small gold butterfly clip adorns her long hair. She wears layered gold necklaces and a large gold ring.

The warm glow of a desk lamp softly illuminates a corner of the room, decorated with retro 1990s rock posters.

Beside her are popcorn and vintage magazines.

Behind her, in the doorway of a dark corridor, a figure wearing a ghost face costume stands silently, their silhouette partially hidden in shadow, evoking a sense of suspense and fear.

The photo has the grainy, low-light look of 1990s film, with warm highlights intertwined with deep shadows to create an eerie, dreamlike atmosphere.

Convert the imaage into a dreamy Y2K photo. The subject is lying on a pink satin bed, clutching a '90s-style corded telephone.

A gold butterfly hairpin accents her flowing hair. She accessorizes with delicate gold necklaces and accessories, including a large gold ring.

The room behind her is girly, filled with '90s-style posters, creating a dreamy atmosphere. Her makeup is simple and elegant, with brown lipstick and lip liner.

The photo has a grainy '90s feel, and the light source simulates a table lamp in a dimly lit room at night. Next to her is a bowl of popcorn and some '90s-style magazines.

A figure in a ghost face costume stands behind her, staring at her. His silhouette is dimly lit, standing in the doorway of a dark hallway. The overall dark tone of the image creates an eerie feeling.

Take a photo using a Polaroid camera. The photo should look like a normal photo, without any clear subjects or props. The photo should have a slight blur effect, and the light source should be evenly distributed across the frame, such as a flash in a dark room. Replace the background with a simple white curtain.

The subject is photographed with a person wearing a white ghost mask and a black robe. The ghost mask stands behind the subject, with one hand playfully placed on the subject's neck. The subject looks shocked, creating an eerie yet humorous atmosphere. Do not retouch the face.

Using reference photo. Do not change my face, facial features, or hair — keep color and length the same.

Create a dreamy Y2K-style photo of me standing on a forest path with cabins in the far background. My long hair is in a ponytail. I wear dainty silver necklaces, silver accessories, and chunky silver rings. Outfit: short red 70s gym shorts with white trim, a white 'Camp Crystal Lake' ringer sweatshirt with red accents, white knee-high socks with two red stripes, and black-and-white Converse sneakers. Makeup is simple yet glamorous with red gloss and black liner.

The photo has a grainy 70s vibe, fallen gold, brown, and red leaves around. Ghostface stands dimly lit behind a tree watching. Add tattoos to my arms, hands, and legs.

Use my photo to create me with long red hair styled straight and dramatic makeup with subtle Chucky-inspired stitches and scars, laying on a bed facing the front in a zoomed-in chest-up shot that subtly emphasizes her curvy figure and prominent hips. She holds a 1988 magazine and a lollipop while glancing thoughtfully. She wears bright red lipstick with brown lipliner and a sexy Chucky-inspired costume with colorful striped sleeves and embroidered details mimicking Chucky’s outfit.

Her face, chest, and curves are illuminated by neon-colored string lights and a glowing jack-o’-lantern. The bed has luxurious satin sheets reflecting neon light. Chucky sits beside her on the bed, leaning slightly and looking down at her cleavage with a surprised expression. The walls are covered in Chucky posters, with Halloween decorations including cobwebs, hanging bats, and spooky string lights. Bold geometric patterns, a boombox, and a colorful shag carpet complete the background. Ultra-realistic rendering, cinematic lighting, sharp focus, spooky 1988 atmosphere.

Create a photo of me in a dreamy Y2K style standing in a 70s kitchen decorated with vintage Halloween decor. A retro TV in the back shows Pet Sematary as I hold a 90s orange corded phone, daydreaming. My long loose curls are styled with gold clips. I wear dainty gold necklaces, rings, and accessories.

The dark wood, avocado green, and orange kitchen is filled with 1980s Halloween decorations. On the counter are a newspaper, pumpkin carving tools, pumpkin guts, and two spooky jack-o’-lanterns. My makeup is soft glam with brown lip liner and gloss. The lighting is grainy and dim like a nighttime lamp. A bowl of popcorn sits nearby.

In the dark hallway behind me, Ghostface stands in the doorway, dimly lit and watching. Do not change my face or features.

Create a grungy-style portrait of me standing in front of a retro bathroom mirror, applying black lipstick in a confident, sexy pose. Do not alter my facial features. I wear a black shirt, dark distressed jeans, and an oversized black leather jacket. My long dark brunette hair flows naturally around my face.

I wear dainty silver necklaces, silver accessories, and chunky silver rings. My makeup is dark and glamorous. The photo has a grainy 90s look, with scattered makeup items on the counter. The bathroom walls are covered with scary movie posters. Behind me in the dimly lit doorway stands a man in a Ghostface costume, faintly illuminated. The background is dark and ominous.

A young woman in a leopard faux fur coat, black stockings, and red heels sits next to Ghostface in red movie theater seats, both holding popcorn. Above them, a red neon sign glows. Behind them is a silver sequin curtain.

Lighting is cinematic and dark. The image is framed like a Polaroid with the date 'DEC 24 ’98'.

A realistic horror photo of a young woman sitting on her bed, holding a vintage landline phone and looking nervous. Behind the slightly open bedroom door stands Ghostface in his black cloak and white mask, partially hidden in the shadows.

Cinematic lighting, eerie atmosphere, horror movie still.

Take a candid close-up photo of me with a disposable camera.

I'm coyly looking over my shoulder at a Halloween party in 1992. The background is dark with low ambient lighting, but the photo is taken with flash.

My costume is a simple red latex full body suit, and I'm wearing a headband with red devil horns.

My facial features must remain exactly the same. I am not laughing.

Create a grungy-style portrait of me bending over in front of a retro bathroom mirror, applying lipstick in a confident, sexy pose.

I wear a red dress and an oversized black leather jacket. My long wavy dark brown hair frames my face with two loose strands in front, styled with gold butterfly clips on each side.

I wear delicate gold jewelry, including dainty necklaces, accessories, and chunky gold rings. My makeup is dark and glamorous.

The photo has a grainy 90s aesthetic, with makeup scattered around the counter. The bathroom walls are covered with scary movie posters.

Behind me, a man wearing a Ghostface costume stands in the doorway of a dimly lit hallway. His body is faintly illuminated, watching silently.

The background is dark and ominous. DO NOT CHANGE MY FACE.

Create a realistic image using my face without changing it. Place me sitting inside a 1966 Chevy Impala, black with gold flakes on 26 chrome spokes and white walls. I wear large hoop earrings, old-school makeup, and long wavy red hair. My arm hangs out of the car window.

The background shows a sunset with palm trees, giving a Chicano-style vibe. Realistic, detailed, old-school aesthetic.
